name: Station Six
description:
Due to the recent overpopulation of Earth, humanity has needed to look to Mars as a new home. A trade agreement between the two planets to sustain life has been formed, called the Agreement of Mars and Earth (AME). This AME system relies on a series of unique space stations to ensure life on Mars is sustainable for the future of mankind.

The Mission: Station 1 has received an automated distress signal from Station 6, but no communication with the distressed station has been established. We are sending you, Minerva, our most specialized AI to investigate the Station 6 distress call, and return with your findings.
